Very Short Introductions are the perfect way to get ahead in a new subject quickly. Our expert authors combine facts, analysis, new ideas, and enthusiasm to make often challenging topics highly readable.
So, where's the gap in your knowledge? ...
Take a look at our list of Very Short Introductions reading guides, written by our authors. They will provoke discussions and help you to question again why you think what you think.
series.note: Books should be numbered. For example, Philosophy is book number 55, Consciousness, 121 and Psychology, 6 as printed on the spine of these books. (I own them.)
